caption: A group of women is seen praying in a room. Afterward, a maid is dressing up a lady in white. The maid helps the lady put on a beautiful dress, and she hurriedly leaves the room. Many carriages arrive at an estate. Inside the hall, there are elegantly dressed ladies and gentlemen. We can see the lady who left earlier is now among the crowd. She first shakes hands and chats with a man in brown attire. Later, she encounters a man in a black suit who gracefully kisses her hand. The lady engages in conversation with a lady wearing a blue dress.
